import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create next step for ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/next-steps/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new next step (task) for a ticket to track required work before resolution. Next steps help break down complex tickets into manageable, assignable tasks that can be completed by different team members or tracked against deadlines.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to find the ticket and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **TicketNextStepTypeId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) to list available step types.

**Workflow Example**
1. Locate ticket: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) → extract `TicketId`
2. Choose step type: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) → select appropriate type
3. Create step: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-ticket-next-step) with step details
4. View steps: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) to confirm creation

**Request Body**: Provide `Title`, `Description`, optional `AssignedUserId`, `DueDate`, and `TicketNextStepTypeId`.

**Use Cases**: Creating checklist items for complex troubleshooting, assigning follow-up tasks, tracking multi-step resolution processes.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-next-steps) – List all next steps
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/next-steps/\{nextStepId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-ticket-next-step) – Update a next step
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types) – List available step types

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a workflow-driven ticket next step. The `TicketNextStepTypeId` references a next-step type that defines the resolution behavior.","properties":{"TicketNextStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the next step. Required for updates, auto-generated for creates."},"TicketNextStepTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the next-step type. Obtain via [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types)."},"Subject":{"type":"string","description":"Display name or subject for the step.","example":"Requestor acknowledgment required","nullable":true},"ExternalId":{"type":"string","description":"Optional external reference ID for integration with external systems.","nullable":true},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset identifier to associate with the step (e.g., for part replacement steps).","nullable":true},"AssetTag":{"type":"string","description":"Asset tag to associate with the step.","nullable":true},"FilterSetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Optional filter set identifier for dynamic resolution conditions.","nullable":true}},"required":["TicketNextStepTypeId"],"example":{"TicketNextStepTypeId":"6fca0dae-7b8e-4ac5-9ad8-8a4b5be6f7c3","Subject":"Requestor acknowledgment required"},"title":"TicketNextStepRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

Next steps represent actions or conditions that must be completed (resolved) before certain workflow transitions or ticket closure.","properties":{"TicketNextStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this next step."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier where this next step was created."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier for multi-product environments."},"TicketNextStepTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the next-step type (e.g., 'Requestor acknowledgment', 'Part ordered'). Obtain via [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/next-step/types](/docs/api/tickets/list-ticket-next-step-types)."},"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent ticket identifier."},"IsResolved":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the step has been resolved. Computed from ResolvedDate presence.","readOnly":true},"ResolvedById":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier who resolved the step.","nullable":true},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset identifier associated with the step resolution (e.g., for part replacement steps).","nullable":true},"AssetTag":{"type":"string","description":"Asset tag associated with the step resolution.","nullable":true},"ResolvedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the step was resolved. >
  
</StatusCodes>
